title: Bound Print, 1738–94
inscribed:
Around portrait medallion: Louis Stanislaus Xavier de Bourbon, Monsier Frere du Roi

On tablet: Recueil d'Ornemens Dedie a Monsieur en l'Annee 1777. Par G.P. Cauvet/d'Aix en Provence/Sculpteur de son/Altesse Royale.

Bottom left: Taraval inv.

Bottom right: Ja Le Roy, sculp.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Portrait of Monsier in a medallion with an allegorical figure of architecture and a genius holding a tablet with the series title

tombstone.epitaph:
Bound Print, 1738–94.
1738–94. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-204-2.
